name: makeSecureTokenForExpirationDate(ofPersistableContentKey:completionHandler:)
desc: Creates a secure server playback context that the client sends to the key server to get an expiration date for the given persistable content key data.
declaration:
func makeSecureTokenForExpirationDate(ofPersistableContentKey persistableContentKeyData: Data, 
                    completionHandler handler: @escaping (Data?, Error?) -> Void)
